data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 4, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Irving Zurita (Queretaro) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Mazatlan.
Jose Ortiz is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 7, Mazatlan's Jose Ortiz looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 18, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 21, In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Queretaro.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Jonathan Betancourt for Queretaro is whistled offside.
In the minute 27, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 30, Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Queretaro's Julian Velazquez has been booked in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 33, Free kick Mazatlan.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo waits before resuming play because Martin Rodriguez for Mazatlan is still down.
Martin Rodriguez for Mazatlan is back on the field again.
In the minute 37, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan are pushing forward but Gonzalo Jara's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 43, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Queretaro.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 44, Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda has run offside.
In the minute 45, At Estadio La Corregidora the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Queretaro make their first substitution with Kevin Ramirez replacing Jonathan Betancourt.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Omar Islas.
Angel Sepulveda with an assist there.
In the minute 48, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Queretaro drives forward and Irving Zurita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio La Corregidora.
Queretaro pushes forward through Angel Sepulveda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 54, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Fernando Aristeguieta of Mazatlan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Francisco Palencia is making the team's second substitution at Estadio La Corregidora with Miguel Sansores replacing Fernando Aristeguieta.
The away team have replaced Jose Ortiz with Candido Ramirez. This is the first substitution made today by Francisco Palencia.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 58, Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a second substitution, with Gonzalo Montes replacing Omar Arellano.
In the minute 59, Queretaro are coming forward and Omar Islas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Queretaro's Fernando Madrigal gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio La Corregidora.
Mazatlan's Aldo Rocha misses with an attempt on goal.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio La Corregidora.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Queretaro.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Mario Osuna is on a sub for Roberto Meraz for Mazatlan.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Angel Sepulveda.
In the minute 75, Sebastian Sosa (Queretaro) has replaced the possibly injured Angel Sepulveda at Estadio La Corregidora.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Queretaro.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 80, Alexis Doldan is replacing Kevin Escamilla for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mazatlan are coming forward and Luis Mendoza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 86, Gonzalo Jara (Mazatlan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 88, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Goal! Mario Osuna equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 89, That's a fine assist from Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Mazatlan.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
